div.head: 產腸不上
div.div: failure of the birth intestine to ascend

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the birth intestine to ascend

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tuo 陰脫 , yin prolapse . Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry zhu tie qi 諸鐵 器：磨刀水，服，利小便，塗脫肛痔核，產腸不上 , “The water used when grinding knives: ingested it stimulates urination. Apply to prolapse of the rectum, piles, and birth intestine that fails to ascend ”.
